name: Narrative Reframing
description: Rewriting personal history by shifting the meaning of past trauma to serve a higher purpose.

cards.title: Identifying the Existing Trauma Narrative
cards.description: Bringing awareness to the unconscious stories being repeated about past pain.
bulletpoints: Mapping trauma perception to recognize hidden patterns.
Identifying negative loops that keep replaying in thought.
Acknowledging the internalized meaning assigned to past pain.
cards.summaryText: Map the trauma loop, surface the patterns, and own the meaning you’ve been repeating.

cards.title: Transforming the Victim Mindset
cards.description: Recasting yourself as the hero rather than the victim in your life’s story.
bulletpoints: Shifting self-perception from powerless to powerful.
Extracting wisdom and personal strength from past struggles.
Owning the past as a source of growth rather than limitation.
cards.summaryText: Flip the script from victim to hero—mine the strength and claim the growth.

cards.title: Mythologizing Your Life Journey
cards.description: Rewriting personal experiences into a greater, empowering life narrative.
bulletpoints: Framing experiences through heroic archetypes.
Using mythology to redefine struggles as rites of passage.
Crafting a personal legend that aligns with true purpose.
cards.summaryText: Cast your life in mythic archetypes and treat every trial as a rite of passage.

cards.title: Extracting the Hidden Lesson
cards.description: Finding the valuable lessons in past suffering to shift perspective.
bulletpoints: Reframing hardships as training for future challenges.
Identifying wisdom gained from past emotional struggles.
Viewing pain as an investment in future resilience.
cards.summaryText: See hardship as training, harvest the lesson, and bank the resilience gained.

cards.title: Editing the Internal Script
cards.description: Reprogramming the subconscious story with new, empowering language.
bulletpoints: Replacing limiting words with powerful self-affirmation.
Developing a new identity script that aligns with confidence.
Rewriting self-talk to reflect resilience and self-mastery.
cards.summaryText: Edit the inner script—swap limiting language for confident, resilient self-talk.

cards.title: Turning Pain into Fuel
cards.description: Harnessing emotional energy from past wounds to drive future success.
bulletpoints: Using emotional charge as motivation for achievement.
Redirecting frustration into creative and intellectual breakthroughs.
Viewing past obstacles as preparation for mastery.
cards.summaryText: Turn old wounds into drive, creative breakthroughs, and mastery fuel.

cards.title: Ritual of Identity Reinvention
cards.description: Performing a symbolic act to mark the transformation of self-narrative.
bulletpoints: Destroying old identity symbols to signify rebirth.
Crafting new physical tokens that reflect empowerment.
Designing a personal ritual to commit to self-transformation.
cards.summaryText: Retire the old symbols, forge empowered tokens, and ritualize your reinvention.

cards.title: Overwriting Trauma Responses
cards.description: Using cognitive reprogramming techniques to change how past events are emotionally processed.
bulletpoints: Replacing trauma triggers with neutral or positive associations.
Developing conscious response mechanisms for emotional rewiring.
Training the nervous system to detach from old pain cycles.
cards.summaryText: Overwrite triggers with new associations and retrain your nervous system for calm.

cards.title: Aligning Personal History with Purpose
cards.description: Weaving past struggles into a mission-driven life path.
bulletpoints: Finding the hidden mission within past suffering.
Integrating past pain into meaningful service or impact.
Viewing hardships as stepping stones toward life’s greater work.
cards.summaryText: Align your history with purpose—let past pain fuel mission and service.

cards.title: Crafting the Future Self Narrative
cards.description: Writing a compelling story of who you are becoming.
bulletpoints: Defining the ideal self and its characteristics.
Developing a narrative structure that guides future actions.
Using visualization to embody the future self in the present.
cards.summaryText: Author the future self, script the journey, and embody it through vivid visualization.

cards.title: The Power of Repetition in Rewriting Reality
cards.description: Using consistent mental reinforcement to solidify a new personal history.
bulletpoints: Practicing daily affirmations aligned with the rewritten identity.
Using repetition to replace old neural pathways with new ones.
Creating a written life manifesto for continual reinforcement.
cards.summaryText: Reinforce the new story daily, repave the neural pathways, and live by your manifesto.

cards.title: Erasing Negative Imprints
cards.description: Removing subconscious programming that reinforces disempowering narratives.
bulletpoints: Rewriting childhood narratives to remove internalized limitations.
Reprogramming the subconscious mind with new empowering truths.
Flipping negative memories into signs of resilience and strength.
cards.summaryText: Recode old narratives, seed empowering truths, and recast memories as proof of resilience.

cards.title: Owning Your Life’s Story with Unapologetic Confidence
cards.description: Embracing and taking full ownership of personal history without shame.
bulletpoints: Viewing every experience as an essential chapter in personal growth.
Refusing to let past mistakes define present identity.
Standing in full authority over personal history and transformation.
cards.summaryText: Own every chapter without apology, drop old labels, and stand sovereign over your story.
